parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
True (lit: made of truth), real, genuine. From alethes; truthful.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Full assurance, conviction, confidence. From plerophoreo; entire confidence.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To sprinkle, cleanse ceremonially by sprinkling. From a derivative of rhaino; to render besprinkled, i.e. Asperse.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.
